thread.title: Three injured as taxi crashes through roof
thread.title_full: Three injured as taxi crashes through roof | News24

author: news24.com
title: Three injured as taxi crashes through roof
text:
Cape Town - Three people were injured when a taxi veered off the road and crashed through the roof of an Inanda house in Durban on Friday night.
Netcare 911 spokesperson Chris Botha said paramedics and fire services arrived at the scene in Twins Road at 19:30 and found the vehicle inside the house, along with the three occupants.
"Fortunately the house was empty at the time of the accident," he said.
The patients were stabilised on site before being transported to a nearby hospital.
